The two forms of vitelliform macular dystrophy each have characteristic changes in the macula that can be detected during an eye examination.",GHR,vitelliform macular dystrophy
How many people are affected by vitelliform macular dystrophy ?,Vitelliform macular dystrophy is a rare disorder; its incidence is unknown.,GHR,vitelliform macular dystrophy
